WorkItem.ClosedComment: Retribution isn't anywhere near operational now. Closing issue.When the model enters a workable state and stats are off, then it's time to report those.  Right now. just about everything with ret is going to be wrong. Pointing that out isn't necessary :p
WorkItem.Description:
When I inspect my gear with Rawr, it advicec to reforge all of my gear to Expertise, but I have an expertise cap with the Seal of Truth and the Glyph of Truth. 
However, I can't choose Seal of Truth in the Options - Fight Parameters. Glyph of Truth is not available too at the Talents - Glyph. 
It would be great for retribution to have an opportunity to point that there is an expertise cap already.

Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Can't choose Seal of Truth in the fight options
